TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DesignPackage extends System.Object
public ref class DesignPackage abstract sealed

Docs.summary: A static class that is used to import and export a design package to and from a site collection.

example.para: The following example demonstrates how to export a design package from a source site collection and install it into another site collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Apply (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site, Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.DesignPackageInfo info);
.method public static hidebysig void Apply(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site, class Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.DesignPackageInfo info) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Apply (site As SPSite, info As DesignPackageInfo)
public: static void Apply(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPSite ^ site, Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::DesignPackageInfo ^ info);

Docs.param: The object into which to apply the design package.
Docs.summary: Applies the specified design package to a site.

remarks.para: The design package can only be applied after it is installed.

Docs.exception: Site parameter should not be null.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.DesignPackageInfo Export (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site, bool includeSearchConfiguration);
.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.DesignPackageInfo Export(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site, bool includeSearchConfiguration) cil managed

public: static Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::DesignPackageInfo ^ Export(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPSite ^ site, bool includeSearchConfiguration);

Docs.param: true if the search configuration should be exported; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Exports the design of the root web of the specified site.
Docs.exception: Site parameter should not be null.

Docs.param: true if the search configuration should be exported; otherwise, false.
Docs.summary: Exports the design of the root web of the specified site.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void Install (Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site, Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.DesignPackageInfo info, string path);
.method public static hidebysig void Install(class Microsoft.SharePoint.SPSite site, class Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.DesignPackageInfo info, string path) cil managed
Public Shared Sub Install (site As SPSite, info As DesignPackageInfo, path As String)
public: static void Install(Microsoft::SharePoint::SPSite ^ site, Microsoft::SharePoint::Publishing::DesignPackageInfo ^ info, System::String ^ path);

Docs.param: The object into which to install the package.
The design package information to be installed.
The design package path to be installed.
Docs.summary: Installs a design package into a site.

remarks.para: The method imports a design package into a site. The design package must be applied to the target site after the installation is done.

Docs.exception: All of the parameters should not be null.
